nodes.text: Portillo was a member of the Gungan species who worked as a physician during the last decades of the Galactic Republic. In the months that followed the Invasion of Naboo in 32 BBY, Doctor Portillo was among the Gungans who emigrated from their homeworld of Naboo as part of the colonization effort of the water moon Ohma-D'un. The physician came to work at the mediglobe of New Otoh Gunga, the capital of the Ohma-D'un settlement.
